Rutherford.Name: Ernest Rutherford
Rutherford.Shop.Name: Ancestral
Rutherford.Shop.Flavour: Japanese styled food, small portions, high quality, distinct flavours, make up your own mind about price
Rutherford.PowerUpDen.Name: Level 2 chill zone
Rutherford.VillainsLair.Name: Superconductor lab
Rutherford.VillainsLair.Flavour: Ideal place for a Physics villain, wicked things to do with super-conductors
Rutherford.InnKeeper.Name: Joshsun
Rutherford.InnKeeper.Dialogue.Greeting: Welcome sir / madam, to the humble Ancestral cafe
Rutherford.InnKeeper.Dialogue.Farewell: Bye bye, remember Newton's fourth law: "if you drink too much you will fall over"
Rutherford.InnKeeper.Dialogue.Options: We have the following quality items available
Rutherford.Villain.Name: Simon Brown
Erskine.Name: Jack Erskine
Erskine.Flavour: Home to Computer Science, Maths & Stats and Software Engineering (sort of).
Erskine.Shop.Name: Reboot Cafe
Erskine.Shop.Flavour: Maybe Compsoc etc, live on beer not coffee?
Erskine.HomeBase.Name: Basement, seating area
Erskine.HomeBase.Flavour: Surprisingly light and airy for a basement
Erskine.PowerUpDen.Name: Lab 133
Erskine.Hospital.Name: Level 4 Maths & Stats study help area
Erskine.VillainsLair.Name: Level 5
Erskine.InnKeeper.Name: Alice
Erskine.Villain.Name: Matthias Galster
Erskine.Villain.Taunt: I hope you had a nice weekend

EngCore.Hospital.Name: Eng. Core, ground floor central area
EngCore.VillainsLair.Name: Link Level 5
EngCore.Villain.Name: Administration
EngCore.Villain.Taunt: “All courses are full. No you cannot change modules. You'll need to apply in writing within five workign days.”
JamesHight.Name: James Hight
JamesHight.Shop.Name: Shilling Club, 1864
JamesHight.Shop.Items: Coffee, Pie, SBurger, Salad, Wedges, Eggs
JamesHight.HomeBase.Name: Undercroft
JamesHight.PowerUpDen.Name: Level 11
JamesHight.Hospital.Name: UCSA Kitchen
JamesHight.VillainsLair.Name: Level 5, staff cafe
JamesHight.Villain.Name: Librarian
JamesHight.Villain.Taunt: Don't you know the Dewey Decimal System? What, you've never heard of the Library of Congress either?
Psych.Name: Psychology and Sociology
Psych.Shop.Name: Cafe 101
Psych.InnKeeper.Name: William S.
Psych.InnKeeper.Dialogue.Farewell: Farewell and  remember "There is nothing either good or bad, but thinking makes it so".

Ability.Hero.CheaperItems.Name: Cheaper Items
Ability.Hero.CheaperItems.Flavour: Team discount on purchases in shop, if Commerce student in team.
Ability.Hero.ImprovedOdds.Name: Improved Odds
Ability.Hero.ImprovedOdds.Flavour: For dice and guess the number games, if Mathematics student in team.
Ability.Hero.IncreasedRecoveryRate.Name: Increased Recovery Rate
Ability.Hero.IncreasedRecoveryRate.Flavo: Team recovers from damage faster, if Science student in team.
Ability.Hero.HackMainframe.Name: Hack The Mainframe
Ability.Hero.HackMainframe.Flavour: Team can teleport to the next city (one time use), if Compsoc. student in team.
Ability.Hero.PreventsRobbery.Name: Prevents Robbery
Ability.Hero.PreventsRobbery.Flavour: Team cannot be robbed, if Law student in the team.
Ability.Hero.DamageReduction.Name: Damage Reduction
Ability.Hero.DamageReduction.Flavour: Team receives (20%) less damage during battles if Engineering student in team (body odour).
Ability.Hero.ThrowMoney.Name: Throw Money
Ability.Hero.ThrowMoney.Flavour: Does not serve any useful purpose for this game.
